sentences.en: A quick and convenient method was used for controlling esterification endpoint.
sentences.cn: 并提出一种快速、简易的反应终点控制方法.

sentences.en: An address has not yet been associated with the network endpoint.
sentences.cn: 地址仍未与网络终结点关联.

sentences.en: An algorithm for speech endpoint detection based on time - frequency - variance - summation was proposed.
sentences.cn: 提出了一种基于时频方差和的语音端点检测算法.

sentences.en: Arrow - shaped line pointing right. Drag an endpoint to change the arrow's direction.
sentences.cn: 指向右的箭头形线条. 拖动端点可更改箭头的方向.
但是这是否有一个终点？

sentences.en: Endpoint detection is a very difficult task in the noise environment.
sentences.cn: 在噪声环境下,语音端点检测很困难.

sentences.en: For our tutorial, we only have one endpoint.
sentences.cn: 对于本教程，我们仅有一个端点。

sentences.en: Lowry is not an endpoint assay , so samples should be staggered to obtain more accurate estimates.
sentences.cn: Lowry法 不是一种endpoint分析方法, 所以样品要做梯度稀释,以得到更准确的估值.

sentences.en: The accuracy of speech recognition directly depends on accurate endpoint detection.
sentences.cn: 语音端点检测的精确度直接影响语音识别的准确度.

sentences.en: The endpoint mapper database entry could not be created.
sentences.cn: 无法创建终结点映射表数据库项.

sentences.en: The network transport endpoint already has an address associated with it.
sentences.cn: 网络传输终结点已有与其关联的地址.

sentences.en: The server endpoint cannot perform the operation.
sentences.cn: 服务器终结点无法运行操作.

sentences.en: The use of an average minimizes the endpoint error.
sentences.cn: 这种对端点取平均的做法使测量误差减到最少.

sentences.en: Then I glean the service and port in the WSDL implementation that provides an endpoint for this binding.
sentences.cn: 然后，我在 WSDL 实现中收集服务和端口，该实现为这个绑定提供一个端点。

sentences.en: This paper set up soft - sensor model of crude gasoline endpoint.
sentences.cn: 建立了粗汽油干点软测量模型.
